synopsis.native: Narra, con tintes autobiográficos, la historia de un actor que vuelve de Madrid a su pueblo natal en las cuencas mineras asturianas.
synopsis.english: Max, a man in his 50s with a broken marriage and a failed carrier as actor, is forced to come back from Madrid to his natal home in a mining town in Asturias.
